StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SaveProduc.onStatus]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ID as uniqueiden..er, @RecruiterID as uniqueiden..er, @Month as integer, @Year as integer, @OnProduc.onStatus as bit, @NonProduc.onStatusReason varchar(5), @OtherReasonDetail varchar(50), @LastEditBy as uniqueiden..er AS
DECLARE @ErrMsg varchar(100)
DECLARE @DBID int SET @DBID = DB_ID()
DECLARE @DBNAME nvarchar(128) SET @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Produc.onStatusHistory WHERE Produc.onStatusHistoryID = @ID)
UPDATE Produc.onStatusHistory SET OnProduc.on = @OnProduc.onStatus, NonProduc.onReasonCode = @NonProduc.onStatusReason, OtherReasonDetail = @OtherReasonDetail, UpdatedByUser = @LastEditBy, DateUpdated = GETDATE() WHERE Produc.onStatusHistoryID = @ID
ELSE
INSERT INTO Produc.onStatusHistory ( Produc.onStatusHistoryID, RecruiterID, MonthCode, CalendarYear, OnProduc.on, NonProduc.onReasonCode, OtherReasonDetail, UpdatedByUser, DateUpdated ) VALUES ( @ID, @RecruiterID, @Month, @Year, @OnProduc.onStatus, @NonProduc.onStatusReason, @OtherReasonDetail, @LastEditBy, GETDATE() )
-- If the status is 'EAS','EOT','ASP','RET','RGS', or 'RFC', remove the recruiters from MCRISS by se.ng the TOUR_END_DATE IF @NonProduc.onStatusReason in ('EAS','EOT','ASP','RET','RGS','RFC') BEGIN DECLARE @EndOfTourDate date.me SET @EndOfTourDate = CAST(@Month as varchar(2))+'/1/'+CAST(@Year as varchar(4))
UPDATE Recruiter SET TourEndDate = @EndOfTourDate, UpdatedByUser = @LastEditBy, DateUpdated = GetDate() WHERE RecruiterID = @RecruiterID
IF @@ERROR != 0 BEGIN SET @ErrMsg = 'An error occurred se.ng the tour end date.' RAISERROR (@ErrMsg, 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END END
